attributes.action: Stop the constant meddling during GCSE years
attributes.additional_details:
It appears the Education minister is constantly changing and altering the exams and courses during the two years that students are preparing to take their GCSE's.

This should stop immediately as it's hard enough for students to deal with the pressure of learning for their final exams without the goal posts being constantly moved because someone in Whitehall thinks it should change.

Any changes should be made for the following years students who have yet to start their two years exam cycle.

Please sign this petition to get Mr Gove to stop meddling with the current year ten and eleven curriculums and exams.
